mapper.select: WITH recursive p AS (SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, 1 AS level FROM products_category WHERE products_category.cate_code_ref IS null UNION all SELECT pc.cate_name, pc.cate_code, pc.cate_code_ref, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM products_category pc INNER JOIN p ON pc.cate_code_ref = p.cate_code) SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, level FROM p;

SELECT p.id, user_id, name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, thumbnail, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code WHERE p.id = #{id};

SELECT p.id , user_id ,name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, thumbnail, cumulative_sales, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code
limit #{skip}, #{amount};
SELECT count(*) FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code

choose.when: WHERE TRUE AND name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.cate_name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description like concat ('%', '테스트', '%')
WHERE created_at BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -14 DAY ) AND NOW()
ORDER BY cumulative_sales DESC, id DESC
choose.otherwise: ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC
